issue.title: [R] move use_threads argument to global option
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5504](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5504). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Why wouldn't you want to use the multithreaded API for reading data from arrow into R? We shouldn't clutter our function signatures with options that people won't use.
